Dependencies.h

00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004   
00005   Dependencies.h
00006  
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   The primary function provided in this source file is
00010   ShowDependencyDialogIfNeeded.  It checks a project to see if
00011   any of its WaveTracks contain AliasBlockFiles; if so it
00012   presents a dialog to the user and lets them copy those block
00013   files into the project, making it self-contained.
00014 
00015 **********************************************************************/
00016 
00017 #ifndef __AUDACITY_DEPENDENCIES__
00018 #define __AUDACITY_DEPENDENCIES__
00019 
00020 #include <wx/defs.h>
00021 #include <wx/filename.h>
00022 
00023 #include "Track.h"
00024 
00025 class AliasedFile {
00026  public:
00027   AliasedFile(wxFileName fileName, wxLongLong bytes) {
00028     this->fileName = fileName;
00029     this->bytes = bytes;
00030   }
00031   wxFileName  fileName;
00032   wxLongLong  bytes; // if stored as current default sample format
00033 };
00034 
00035 class AudacityProject;
00036 
00037 WX_DECLARE_OBJARRAY(AliasedFile, AliasedFileArray);
00038 
00039 // True = success, whether dependencies were found or not
00040 bool FindDependencies(AudacityProject *project,
00041             AliasedFileArray *aliasedFiles);
00042 
00043 // Checks for alias block files, modifies the project if the
00044 // user requests it, and returns True if the user continues.
00045 // Returns false if the user clicks Cancel, meaning that they do
00046 // not want to go ahead with the Save/Save As operation.
00047 bool ShowDependencyDialogIfNeeded(AudacityProject *project,
00048                                   bool isSaving);
00049 
00050 #endif
